column1: }}'''Tar-Telemmaitë''' was the fifteenth [[King of Númenor]]. From his time onwards, the Kings ruled from the death of their predecessor to their own demise.  Tar-Telemmaitë loved silver and had his servants always searching for ''mithril''<ref>{{UT
Tar-Telemmaitë either had only one child or his eldest child was a daughter, for upon his death he was succeeded by [[Tar-Vanimeldë]], the third [[Ruling Queen of Númenor
